name: LEGO Dimensions: Aquaman Fun Pack
summary: Become the King of the Seven Seas with Aquaman from DC Comics! Build Aquaman and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place this aquatic hero on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Dive, Growth, Atlantis and Hazard Cleaner abilities to solve puzzles and take down rivals. Use the Aqua Watercraft when you need a swift getaway, and rebuild it into a Seven Seas Speeder and Trident of Fire for upgraded in-game powers!
